location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 8101/49 'SAUDI ARABIAN FRONTIERS. REQUEST FOR COPY LETTER.'

physicalDescription.extent: The arrangement consists of a single letter.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of a single letter from the Foreign Office to the Commonwealth Relations Office requesting a copy of earlier correspondence regarding Saudi Arabian Frontiers.
